Jonas Neubert is currently a research intern at the Neuropsychology and Psychopharmacology research department of the Faculty of Psychology and Neuroscience (FPN) at Maastricht University.
Get in touch via jonas at neubert dot eu


MSc in Cognitive and Clinical Neuroscience
Drug Development and Neurohealth
(research master specialisation)
Maastricht University | 09/2021 – 08/2023
BA in Liberal Arts and Sciences
Social Sciences / Humanites Concentration
Maastricht University | 09/2016 – 08/2021



Member of the Participatory Advisory Council
MIND Foundation | 2021 – 2022
Founder and Coordinator of uniMIND Maastricht
MIND Foundation | 2020 – 2022
Scientific Research Assistant
Institute of Sociology at the Nuremberg Campus of Technology, Friedrich-Alexander Universität Erlangen-Nürnberg | 2020 – 2023
